title: Hypograph (mathematics)
summary: In mathematics, the hypograph or subgraph of a function f : R n â†’ R {\displaystyle f:\mathbb {R} ^{n}\rightarrow \mathbb {R} } is the set of points lying on or below its graph. A related definition is that of such a function's epigraph, which is the set of points on or above the function's graph.
